visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type should be 'line', chart title should be 'Monthly Average Rainfall', axes and labels should have specific styling with colors and font sizes, data series should include monthly rainfall data, custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'line' with an 'x' zoom type enabled. The chart has a light gray background and specific margins for better visual spacing. The x-axis displays months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis shows the rainfall in millimeters with similarly styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly rainfall data with a custom color of teal. The legend is enabled with styled text to match the overall theme. This configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing presentation of the monthly rainfall data.
